Message.Msg: Upon what basis does one thumbs down Donne? Philistines!
Why should I crawl in a hole, she said, you denied it.

The origin of racial PROFILING The day it all started was March 6, 1836. On that fateful day, Davy Crockett woke up and rose from his bunk on the main floor of the Alamo, and walked up to the observation post along the west wall of the fort. William B. Travis and Jim Bowie were already there, looking out over the top of the wall. These three great men gazed at the hordes of Mexicans moving towards the Alamo. With a puzzled look on his face, Crockett turned to Bowie and said, "Jim, are we, by any chance, having some landscaping work done today?
You better start liking Obama now, because Hillary will be the next President.
Most repocks are not good people. Cheney, Bush, #$%$ Mcconnell, the list goes on.

Many conspiracies. People like you like to deny them because your "heroes" are in them up to their necks. You should read a booklet titled; "The Strange Case Of Tyler Kent.' Concerns a young code clerk in our London Embassy just before we entered WW2. He died several years ag in Kerrville, Texas. His case interested me as I too worked in code. My room mate in the school was Harry Browne. Twice a candidate for President on the Libertarian Party ticket. He too has passed recently of Parkinson's Disease.

Sworn testimony IS evidence. Fox news was the only coverage of the Benghazi hearings so it is no wonder that you are still ignorant of what was testified. CNN doesn't want you to hear it. They are still claiming that it is a witch hunt rather than a which hunt. Obama is strangely silent but should be called to testify under oath. His whereabouts during the Benghazi attack is reminiscent of the missing minutes on Nixon's Watergate tapes.

Message.Title: What is wrong with the other 27
Message.Msg: "As of 2010, 23 states and territories have organized State Defense Forces (SDFs) with approximately 14,000 people serving in them." Every state needs an SDF to protect us from the Federal Government.

Like all their other theories, it's empty. Evidence for what? What is the cover up? What is the accusation? The President himself spoke the next morning to address the nation on Benghazi. He called it acts of terror. He never said spontaneous demonstratin or video. He said what it was thought to be, no cover up, no hiding, just the truth. That is the fly in their ointment that spoils it. They try to say the 9/12 speech was about 9/11 because he mentioned it in the Benghazi 9/12 speech. He already gave a 9/11 speech the day before. So duhhh yeah he is giving another one for the h of it, duhhhhh, even though we were attacked during the night, duhhhhhh. What kind of ignorant fool would believe that story, right from faux news? So they run with it, overlookng the fly in their ointment. If they can't believe his birth, what can they believe. Then you can go back to GWB and compare his record on terror compared to Pres Obama. That's what's eating them, Obama is so vastly superior, it's all politics.

"He called it acts of terror" Hogwash. Look at the transcrip and tell us what he actually said in the Rose Garden. Please, no paraphrasing. By the way, if he said what you said why did Rice, days later, rebut him 5 times?

I have shown it before and read the real transcript, and actually watched the speech live on tv. I will pay you $10,000 today into your paypal account if you find spontaneous demonstration in it. You haven't even read it I bet, it pains you to read Obama's words probably, because he is so smart, and it doesn't fit your bias towards him. It's is you who have no evidence. Go search for rose garden speech, go to the transcript, and read it, which you obviously haven't done. You are a good example of what faux news preys on, people who believe, and don't verify. Nothing faux news says about Pres Obama is true, it's automatic. i bet you won't do it, but prefer to keep yammering aimlessly with false information.

"No acts of terror will ever shake the resolve of this great nation, alter that character, or eclipse the light of the values that we stand for." Rose Garden- President Obama 9/12 Susan Rice 4 days later representing the Administration: “Our current best assessment, based on the information that we have at present, is that, in fact, what this began as, it was a spontaneous – not a premeditated – response to what had transpired in Cairo,” By the way, these are from transcrips and FoxNews is not the source. Also for the record.,I never said he said it was a spontaneouse demonstration. Susan Rice did days later. Try to get my post correct, It isn't that complicated.

So, to the extent that anyone can discern meaning from your post, or any of your posts for that matter, the take home message is, after wasting your small span of years on this spinning ball making yourself and everyone around you miserable while you search for fantastical plots and imagined ghosts that are not there, all of you old nutjobs are dying off. That's good and as it should be. I'll spend my time at my work and on the beach waiting for and helping to create the world that will emerge once we've dropped the last of you drains on oxygen and energy into a hole in the ground. You're a demented old fool.

Topic.Title: Finally we find out "What difference...does it make?"

Message.Msg: What makes it so ridiculous to say that, is the President himself gave a Benghazi speech the morning after the attack and said it was acts of terror. Sorry to pop your balloon. Nothing you or ten faux newses can say will change that. It is all for nothing. The real perpetrators weren't caught, and no one ever said the video guy did the attack. That is just pain ignorant thinking to say that. He may have inspired them, and no one knows that yet. Nothing was covered up. "what differnce does it make" refers to Hilary's answer about the insane questioning months after about the name of the attack. We all know it was an attack and four Americans were killed, what is more important, that tragedy, or a name?

Topic.Title: Finally we find out "What difference...does it make?"

Message.Msg: "What makes it so ridiculous to say that, is the President himself gave a Benghazi speech the morning after the attack and said it was acts of terror. Sorry to pop your balloon."' Well, I suppose it's possible Susan Rice was out on 5 different networks four days after his Rose Garden speech calling him either a liar or horribly confused: "No acts of terror will ever shake the resolve of this great nation, alter that character, or eclipse the light of the values that we stand for." Rose Garden- President Obama 9/12 Susan Rice 4 days later representing the Administration: “Our current best assessment, based on the information that we have at present, is that, in fact, what this began as, it was a spontaneous – not a premeditated – response to what had transpired in Cairo,”

I get your posts fine. faux news and romney said he said spont. demonst, which of course tells a lot about romney and what he has forgotten about verifying from his law degree. I was saying it because you said acts of terror was hogwash, which you show it wasn't, it's what he said. What's your point everything looks fine with the statements, what's the problem? Someone, many, changed her talking points for TV, so what. There is nothing to theorize about. The Pres already said acts of terror. She said our current assessment based on what we have at present. There is nothing here. It was an act of terror, four killed, spontaneous or planned, flamed by cairo or not. An act of terror can't come from a spontaneous demonstration? It doesn't matter what it was called on a tv show, nothing changes because of that, and nothing is being covered up. They could call it bag ladies gone wild, who cares, it killed four Americans. That's what Hilary was saying.

Topic.Title: What is wrong with the other 27

Message.Msg: Probably too many pills. What has my pills got to do with an all powerful Federal Government? You will probably blame it on the first Republican President, Abraham Lincoln; and you would be right. After the civil war SDF went out of style until 1956 when Federal law 32 USC was passed. As of 1995 21 states had a SDF. They were Alabama, Alaska, California, Indiana, Louisiana, Georgia, Maryland, Massachusetts, Mississippi, Montana, New Mexico, New York, Ohio, Oregon, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Vermont, Virginia and Washington. Two more have been added but I don't know what states they were. Most of the other states consider it from time to time but it is totally financed by the state so not very popular.
The common denominator is Socialism X One World Government.
